column5: OK all the Pervs that thought this was something else------to the back of the bus  With deer season well on it's way I thought I'd show you a new painting I'm working on---Just got the antlers done today and the deer underpainted---it'll be a while yet  I'll post when it's done.
nice work so far  Andy,quit picking on Marty.He,ll get mad and take that big buck before I .LOL
Figured I'd give one more update as it now looks more like it should.  Again will post when done
Now your adding some nice color Bush.  What size is the canvas your painting on ?

48 x 16 Bri.  This foto does'nt do justice to this painting---when I walk by it--that deer stares at me.  I always said I would never paint deer as so many artists' do  But if I ever did---it better be perfect---lets say I've been close to many so there's no room for error.  Let's put it this way---It's turnin out good enough I'm considering limited edition prints.  Like I said--I'll let you guys know what it turns out to be.
Looking forward to the finish.  Nice work,
That is some superb brush work Terry Looking forward to the end results Thanks for sharing Jacques
I don't shoot pics andy...me shoots the real things !!! lol
Ok ---here he is---hot off the easel  Call'n it Misty Morning Whitetail-----Think I have all the hairs in place
Well worth the wait. Great job Terrence.  Nice detail on the legs. Shows that startled reaction
Thanks everyone---my wife says you better get it right you've seen enough of them.
